greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = sign(A323244(n))*A001511(A323244(n)), with a(n) = 0 if A323244(n) = 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (based on Hans Havermann's factorization of A156552)
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
program: A156552(n) = {my(f = factor(n), p2 = 1, res = 0); for(i = 1, #f~, p = 1 << (primepi(f[i, 1]) - 1); res += (p * p2 * (2^(f[i, 2]) - 1)); p2 <<= f[i, 2]); res}; \\ From A156552 by _David A. Corneth_
A001511ext(n) = if(!n,n,sign(n)*(1+valuation(n,2))); \\ Like A001511 but gives 0 for 0 and -A001511(-n) for negative numbers.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 17 2019
